title: Trimming, 18th century
medium: White, black,  and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Two crowned shields; one shows seven bees under three crosses, and the other show a sun-face within a border with stars (?) in blue, pink, yellow, and black on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Trimming, 18th century.
18th century. White, black,  and colored silk in uncut velvet weave.. Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection. 1943-46-52.
